advice.pattern: The 'FileVersion' property is no longer supported
advice.message:
Upgrade the file version of the database by using SQL Central.
In SQL Central: File and then Upgrade Database.

On Server please start the Network Tools ( can be found in Start Menu / SqlAnywhere/ Tools / Network Tools Demo ).
Press the ping button to make sure the port 2638 is active. Check also the Help for details.
Please copy the file dbjdbc17.dll from C:/Users/<YourUser>/.DbSchema/drivers/SqlAnywhere in java.library.path. Look in Help / About dialog for current Java path.
